CodeList.Name: Medical History Event Date Type

Description.TranslatedText: Terminology relevant to the classification of the medical condition or event by which MHSTDTC is defined.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation. (NCI)
A noteworthy happening that is distinctive in a series of related events.
An increase in frequency and/or worsening of a symptom, condition, or disease.
The point at which the symptoms began or were first noted.

CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Medical History Event Date Type Terminology
